text: he da'uda! Ame tamane dharati upara nayaba banavi didha, tame loko vacce n'yayapurvaka nirnaya karo ane potani maneccha'onum anusarana na karo, nahito te tamane allahana margathi bhatakavi dese, ni:Sanka je loko allahana margathi bhataki jaya che, temana mate sakhata yatana che, etala mate ke te'o hisabana divasane bhuli gaya che
